0eeae45bca689e2372e9ded754385d5b70c6cbe4.query:
INSERT INTO files (id, name, data)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?)

38b4bb3827b4960c1da5cdf12303a96f7e0e1e27.query:
SELECT 
                id AS "id: JobId",
                file_id AS "file_id: FileId",
                language AS "language: Language",
                quality AS "quality: TranslationQuality",
                status AS "status: JobStatus"
            FROM file_jobs

4e4323e37fd9c7fea6ddffc56f3dd44ea08ce58e.query:
SELECT 
                file_jobs.id AS "job_id: JobId",
                file_id AS "file_id: FileId",
                language AS "language: Language",
                quality AS "quality: TranslationQuality",
                status AS "status: JobStatus",
                data
            FROM file_jobs
            INNER JOIN files ON (file_id = files.id)
            WHERE status = 'waiting'
            ORDER BY file_jobs.id DESC
            LIMIT 1

570106ac700ddc88e1472d83e6441e5893349e33.query:
SELECT 
                data AS "data: Vec<u8>"
            FROM files 
            WHERE id = ?

8b3d646d66ea8c108447bc58eb8aa5e9dbe0a481.query:
INSERT INTO segments (file_id, job_id, number, start, end, text, speaker_id)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

8c2f6656d6450367d809972a036614682c4d541d.query:
INSERT INTO file_jobs (file_id, language, quality, status)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

93cd9aed4b825392f1777aabc5eb50c941c296bd.query:
SELECT 
                number     AS "number: i32",
                start      AS "start: i64",
                end        AS "end: i64",
                text       AS "text: String",
                speaker_id AS "speaker_id: String"
            FROM segments
            WHERE file_id = ?

afc13691ddbd9a18048c34d3d2f42b50be0258a5.query: UPDATE file_jobs SET status = ? WHERE id = ?

fef6d1ada165463f213cd3dc3035c70ac7cf3fec.query:
SELECT
                id AS "id: FileId",
                name AS "name: String"
            FROM files
